NEWS.TITLE: Muhammad Ali
NEWS.SHORT_TEXT: Muhammad Ali, a sports figure and three-time world heavyweight boxing champion, died on Friday.
NEWS.FULL_TEXT: Muhammad Ali, a pioneering sports figure and three-time world heavyweight boxing champion, died on Friday at age 74. His accomplishments and fame outside the ring rivaled his achievements within it: his charisma, his religious and political stances

NEWS.TITLE: Could Judge Be Trump Neutral?
NEWS.SHORT_TEXT: Donald J. Trump’s remarks that a Muslim judge might have trouble remaining neutral.
NEWS.FULL_TEXT: Donald J. Trump said Sunday that a Muslim judge might have trouble remaining neutral in a lawsuit against him, extending his race-based criticism of the jurist overseeing the case to include religion.

NEWS.TITLE: A Weekend in Chicago
NEWS.SHORT_TEXT: By the time Memorial Day weekend was over in Chicago, 64 people had been shot, six fatally.
NEWS.FULL_TEXT: The New York Times visited scores of shooting scenes to capture what is happening on the streets — and why. “Shooting in Chicago is like a cancer,” says Charles Parker, 46, “It’s starting to spread out, and I just figured it was a matter of time.”

COMMENTS.COMMENT_TEXT: After him, blackness as a point of public pride had also drifted away from American culture...
Some of what’s happened in this period has been rightly received as radical
